indexInfo.EngineDescription: The Apache Lucene project develops open-source search software.
indexInfo.IndexFieldNameList:
PID, repositoryName,
fgs.label, fgs.contentModel, fgs.createdDate,
fgs.lastModifiedDate, fgs.state, fgs.type,
dc.creator, dc.date, dc.description, dc.format, dc.identifier,
dc.publisher, dc.relations, dc.right, dc.source,
dc.subject, dc.title,
DS2.text,
others depending on the indexing stylesheet.
indexInfo.EngineAttribution: The Apache Lucene project © 2005, The Apache Lucene project, All Rights Reserved
